model_savepath: You save modelweight to under this directory. [ex] /home/vmlab/Desktop/data/modelweight/Abdomen/28-44-44/mask
module_name: The directory name which has model and system and so on. [ex] UNet_with_pad
system_name: The system class name in system.py in module_name directory. [ex] UNetSystem
checkpoint_name: The checkpoint class name in modelCheckpoint.py in module_name directory. [ex] BestAndLatestModelCheckpoint
api_key: Your comet.ml API KEY. If you don' use it, then, feed No
project_name: For comet.ml if you don't feed api_key, you don't have to. [ex] abdomen
